title: Send Image To Wsa By Adb
param: if ((adb connect 127.0.0.1:58526) -like \"*connected*\") { adb push -p \"{path}\" \"/sdcard/Download/{name}\" | adb shell \"am broadcast -a android.intent.action.MEDIA_SCANNER_SCAN_FILE -d 'file:///storage/emulated/0/Download/{name}'\"}else{msg \"wsa is not running\"}
